text: jinakee dasha ye hai ki ve eemaan vaalon mein se svechchha daan karane vaalon par, daanon ke vishay mein aakshep karate hain tatha unhen jo apane parishram hee se kuchh paate (aur daan karate hain), ye (munaafiq) unase upahaas karate hain, allaah unase upahaas karata[1] hai aur unheen ke lie duhkhadaayee yaatana hai
